name: Square Peg in a Round Hole
name_original: Square Peg in a Round Hole
description:
Update: Some collision bugs have been fixed, and falling off the level should always result in failure.

Who are you? Are you a circle or a square?

Created for the Ludum Dare 35 compo in 48 hours. The theme this time was "shapeshifting". In this platformer, you switch between circle and square in order to solve various puzzles.

Go here to rate it.

Thanks for playing!
